The book of life contains the names of all who have ever entered the service of God. Jesus bade his disciples, \93Rejoice, because your names are written in Heaven.\94 [Luke 10:20.] Paul speaks of his faithful fellow-workers, \93whose names are in the book of life.\94 [Philippians 4:3.] Daniel, looking down to \93a time of 
481
trouble, such as never was,\94 declares that God's people shall be delivered, \93everyone that shall be found written in the book.\94 [Daniel 12:1.] And the Revelator says that those only shall enter the city of God whose names \93are written in the Lamb's book of life.\94 [Revelation 21:27.]
